Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. C 060214 ZMX pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning an amendment to the zoning map Section 1d, Borough of the Bronx, Council District no. 11.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 060215 GFX, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter concerning a revocable consent to construct, maintain and use a pedestrian bridge over Manhattan College Parkway, Borough of the Bronx, Council District no. 11.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. C 060335 ZMX pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning an amendment of the zoning map, Section Nos. 4a and 4b, Borough of the Bronx, Council District no. 13.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. C 020087 ZMQ pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning an amendment to the zoning map, Section 9a, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 26.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application no. 20065293 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Radiante LLC, d/b/a City Hall Restaurant to continue to maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 131 Duane Street, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 1.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. C 060214 ZMX pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning an amendment to the zoning map Section 1d, Borough of the Bronx, Council District no. 11.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
